attributes.action: richmond school governers all resign we the parents demand to know exactly why!
attributes.additional_details: The parents of children attending Richmond high school in Richmond north Yorkshire are wanting a full explanation of why all the school governers have resigned, so far we have had a letter on there website which blankly refuses to tell us anything more, public feeling is now running high, we are all extremely worried parents, we have nothing to go on but rumours, as you can appreciate this is very rare all the goveners resigning at once and parents are very worried all we have is rumours, we have a right to know what is happening within the school I hope you can help us resolve this matter, I should expect at some point very soon we will be outside the school with demonstrations and the press, we will not be happy with anything but the truth!
